definition: surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the sanitary conditions of campus' refectories using the microbial methods.
sentences.chinese: 目的采用微生物学检测方法评价学校食堂卫生状况。

sentences.english: Bacteriology, in particular, microbiology had fascinated him.
sentences.chinese: 细菌学，特别是微生物学使他陶醉。

sentences.english: His work advanced the science of microbiology.
sentences.chinese: 他的工作促进了微生物学这门科学。

sentences.english: Eng. ) To provide the basic knowledge of microbiology.
sentences.chinese: 对微生物学知识有基础的了解。

sentences.english: The microbiological safety of food is always an important concern of global health.
sentences.chinese: 微生物学在食品安全的作用，经常引起全球性的关注。

sentences.english: Presently he is Virology Editor - in - Chief of'Veterinary Microbiology '.
sentences.chinese: 现在他是“兽医微生物学”病毒学总编辑。

sentences.english: The blood concentration was measured by the bio-assay method.
sentences.chinese: 血药浓度采用微生物学方法测定。

sentences.english: "Microbiology", Lansing M. Prescott, Donald Klein, John Harley McGraw-Hill Higher Education, 2000
sentences.chinese: 《微生物学》，沈萍，高等教育出版社，2000。

sentences.english: Veterinary Bacteriology and Virology Merchant &Packer. Seventh Edition.
sentences.chinese: 兽医微生物学上册，刘荣标编著，艺轩图书出版社。

sentences.english: Lectures and Tutorials in Immunology, Microbiology, and Cytogenetics - includes hypertext, images, and animations.
sentences.chinese: 免疫学，微生物学和细胞遗传学讲座和指南。

pinyin: sheng1 wu4 yi1 xue2 gong1 cheng2
